name: modifiers
description: Base game modifiers available across all game elements

values.description: Likes the Leader with the most Masteries. Dislikes the one with the Least Masteries.

[BLIST][LI][icon:YIELD_CITIES] [B]Cities [/B]receive [B]+2[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science [/B]per Age when you complete a [icon:RADIAL_CIVICS] [B]Civic Mastery[/B]. This resets at the start of each Age. [LI]Gain [B][icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture [/B]equal to 50% of your total [B][icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science [/B]per turn when you complete a [icon:RADIAL_TECH] [B]Technology Mastery[/B].[/LIST]

[BLIST][LI][icon:YIELD_CITIES] [B]Cities [/B]receive [B]+2[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science [/B]per Age when you complete a [icon:RADIAL_CIVICS] [B]Civic Mastery[/B]. This resets at the start of each Age. [LI]Gain [B][icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture [/B]equal to 50% of your total [B][icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science [/B]per turn when you complete a [icon:RADIAL_TECH] [B]Technology Mastery[/B].[/LIST]
+2[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food on [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvements and [icon:CITY_URBAN] Districts on Navigable Rivers.
Likes Civilizations that don't have Settlements in Desert or Plains. Dislikes those with Settlements in Desert or Plains.
[icon:UNIT_BUCCANEER] Buccaneers gain the [icon:NAR_REW_PROMOTION] Looting Promotion for free.
Likes the Civilization with least amount of land. Dislikes the one with the largest amount of land.
Likes the Civilization with the highest[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. Dislikes the one with the lowest[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness.
+2 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from [icon:SPECIALIST] Specialists. -2 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.
+4 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for Ranged Units when defending.
+5 [icon:TRADE_ROUTE]Trade Route range for every[icon:CITYSTATE]Economic City-State you are Suzerain of.
+1% total [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for every [icon:YIELD_CITIES] City, or +2% if the [icon:YIELD_CITIES] City is in [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Tundra Terrain.
+1% total [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for every [icon:YIELD_CITIES] City, or +2% if the [icon:YIELD_CITIES] City is in [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Tundra Terrain.
+1 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on [icon:CITY_URBAN] Districts in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities in [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Tundra Terrain.

arguments.YieldType: YIELD_FOOD, YIELD_PRODUCTION, YIELD_GOLD, YIELD_SCIENCE, YIELD_CULTURE, YIELD_HAPPINESS, YIELD_DIPLOMACY

values.description: +5%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards constructing [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Buildings for every [icon:CITYSTATE]Scientific City-State you are Suzerain of.
Likes Civilizations with Cities in their empire. Dislikes those with Towns in their empire.
+2 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on displayed [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Great Works.
+3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for all Units against Land Units.
+2 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resources in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns with a [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness Building.
Likes the Leader with the least Unhappy Settlements. Dislikes the one with the most Unhappy Settlements.
[icon:UNIT_BUCCANEER] Buccaneers gain 1 charge to create a new [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Town.
+2[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on [icon:Action_Fortify] Fortifications in Settlements with at least 1 Garrisoned Unit.
Likes the Civilization with the least Great Works. Dislikes the one with the most Great Works.
Likes the Civilization that has had the most Celebrations. Dislikes the one that has had the fewest Celebrations.
+25% [icon:GROWTH_RATE] Growth Rate in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns with a [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource assigned to them.
All [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Buildings receive a +1 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science Adjacency with the City Hall and Palace.
+3[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in Settlements for each other friendly Settlement within 6 tiles.
When you defeat an enemy Unit, gain [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture equal to 25% of its [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength.
[icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns gain [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food equal to your [icon:ATTRIBUTE_EXPANSIONIST] Expansionist Attribute. -5 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.
+30% Commander Experience. +1 [icon:Action_Move] Movement for Fleets and Armies.
Decrease [icon:RELATIONSHIP] Relationship with Leaders of the opposing [icon:NOTIFICATION_IDEOLOGY_CHOSEN] Ideology with the most Factories.
Likes the Civilization with the most Specialists. Dislikes the one with the fewest Specialists.
+4 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for all Units in Distant Lands.
-10 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in all [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities while at [icon:WAR] War.
[icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Buildings, [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvements and [icon:CITY_URBAN] Districts in Settlements with a stationed Commander are not damaged by [icon:YIELD_PLAGUE] Major Outbreaks.
+2 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in Settlements for every [icon:TRADITION] Tradition slotted into the [icon:GOVERNMENT] Government.
+1 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for Land and Naval Units in friendly territory for every [icon:TRADITION] Tradition slotted into the [icon:GOVERNMENT] Government.
-75%[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold and [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns with a [icon:TOWN_FOCUS] Specialization.
+3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for all Land Units in your own territory.
Decrease [icon:RELATIONSHIP] Relationship with Leaders of the opposing [icon:NOTIFICATION_IDEOLOGY_CHOSEN] Ideology with the most captured Settlements.
+3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for all Units in Distant Lands. Units gain +5 [icon:Action_Heal] Healing.
+3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for all Units in Homelands.
+4 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold from [icon:SPECIALIST] Specialists. -3 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.
+2[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science in Settlements with a garrisoned Unit.

[icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Buildings, [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvements, and [icon:CITY_URBAN] Districts in Settlements that follow your [icon:NAR_REW_RELIGION] Religion are not damaged by [icon:YIELD_PLAGUE] Minor Outbreaks.

+5 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in [icon:YIELD_PLAGUE] Infected Settlements that follow your [icon:NAR_REW_RELIGION] Religion. These Settlements gain a [icon:UNIT_MIGRANT] Migrant when [icon:YIELD_PLAGUE] Infected.

+5 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in [icon:YIELD_PLAGUE] Infected Settlements that follow your [icon:NAR_REW_RELIGION] Religion. These Settlements gain a [icon:UNIT_MIGRANT] Migrant when [icon:YIELD_PLAGUE] Infected.
+2 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture Buildings. +20% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards constructing [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture Buildings.
Training a Naval Unit grants [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture equal to 25% of the Unit's base [icon:YIELD_Production] Production cost.
+30%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards training Infantry and Ranged Units.
Likes leaders that build Naval Units. Dislikes leaders that neglect to build Naval Units.
+15% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production but -15% [icon:GROWTH_RATE] Growth Rate in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.
+15 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for all Military Units against [icon:UNIT_TREASURE_FLEET] Treasure Convoys.
When you capture a [icon:UNIT_TREASURE_FLEET] Treasure Convoy Unit, it is worth an additional Treasure Fleet Point.
Land Military Units fight as though they were at full [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength even when damaged.
+1 [icon:Action_Move] Movement for Civilian Units. +1 charge for [icon:UNIT_MISSIONARY] Missionaries.

[icon:Action_Pillage] Pillaging Improvements grants [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food in all [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns equal to 50% of the yield or [icon:Action_Heal] HP gained. -3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for all Military Units against [icon:CITY_FORTIFIED] Fortified Districts.

Decrease [icon:RELATIONSHIP] Relationship with Leaders of the opposing [icon:NOTIFICATION_IDEOLOGY_CHOSEN] Ideology with the most completed [icon:RADIAL_TECH] Tech and [icon:RADIAL_CIVICS] Civic Masteries.
+4 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness from [icon:SPECIALIST] Specialists. -3 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.
Double Relationship gains with Leaders that share a Government type with him. Double the Relationship losses with those that don't share a Government type.
Double Relationship gains with Leaders that share a Government type with him. Double the Relationship losses with those that don't share a Government type.
Can run an extra instance of a single instance diplomatic action.
[icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns gain [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture equal to your [icon:ATTRIBUTE_CULTURAL] Cultural Attribute. -5 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.
Likes Leaders with Wonders in their Capital. Dislike those with Buildings in their Capital.
Likes the Civilization with the greatest number of Military Units. Dislikes the one with the smallest number of Military Units.
When you train an Aircraft or Naval Unit, gain [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science equal to 25% of its [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production cost.
+25% [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold towards purchasing [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Buildings on Coast or Navigable Rivers.
-4 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in each Settlement without a Garrisoned Unit.
+3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for Units in Tundra.
Likes the Civilization with the smallest number of Cavalry Units. Dislikes the one with the greatest number of Cavalry Units.
+10% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities and -1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Maintenance for Units for every [icon:PLAYER_RELATIONSHIP_ALLIANCE] Alliance you ahve.
+50% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards training Naval Units. -1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Maintenance for Naval Units.
+15%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards training Siege and Infantry Units.
Likes leaders that start Formal Wars. Dislikes those that start Surprise Wars.
Likes Civilizations with fewer Wonders than her. Dislikes those that have more Wonders than her.
+5 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on Altars in [icon:YIELD_PLAGUE] Infected Settlements but -10 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on Altars.
+5 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on Altars in [icon:YIELD_PLAGUE] Infected Settlements but -10 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on Altars.
+50% [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence towards the initiating and progressing the [icon:PROJECT] Befriend Independent Project.

+4 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Mountain tiles in your [icon:NOTIFICATION_SELECT_CAPITAL] Capital, +2 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Mountain tiles in other Settlements.

Likes Civilizations with both[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness Buildings in their Settlements. Dislikes those with both[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science and[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Buildings in their Settlements.

Likes Civilizations with both[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science and[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Buildings in their Settlements. Dislikes those with both[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness Buildings in their Settlements.
Likes the Civilization with the most revealed tiles. Dislikes the one with the least revealed tiles.
All [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Buildings gain Adjacency from Lakes.
+3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for Units within the [icon:COMMANDER_RADIUS] Command Radius of a [icon:UNIT_ARMY_COMMANDER] Commander with a Commendation.
Likes Civilizations that don't have any Natural Wonders in their borders. Dislikes those that do have Natural Wonders in their borders.

arguments.YieldType: YIELD_FOOD, YIELD_PRODUCTION, YIELD_GOLD, YIELD_SCIENCE, YIELD_CULTURE, YIELD_HAPPINESS, YIELD_DIPLOMACY

values.description: +5 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength and +2 [icon:Action_Move] Movement for all Units on Navigable Rivers.
When you convert a Settlement you own, gain a [icon:UNIT_MIGRANT] Migrant and damage 3 [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Buildings in that Settlement.
+1 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food and [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on Farms for each adjacent Plantation, and on Plantations for each adjacent Farm.

+1 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and +2 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold for every time a Storm, Flood, or Volcanic Eruption has provided Fertility this Age. [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvements, [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Buildings, and [icon:CITY_URBAN] Districts do not get damaged by Storms.
+1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvements and [icon:CITY_URBAN] Districts on Navigable Rivers.
+6 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for Aircraft attacking an enemy Naval Unit adjacent to a friendly Naval Unit.
Likes the Civilization with the most Quarters. Dislikes the one with the fewest Quarters.
Likes the Civilization with the highest[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence. Dislikes the one with the lowest[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence.
+2 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Mountains. +6[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on [icon:NOTIFICATION_DISCOVER_NATURAL_WONDER] Natural Wonders.
+10% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities per [icon:PLAYER_RELATIONSHIP_HOSTILE] Hostile Relationship. +1 [icon:Action_Move] Movement for all Military Units.
[icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Buildings, [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvements, and [icon:CITY_URBAN] Districts in Coastal Settlements with a Dungeon are not damaged by [icon:YIELD_PLAGUE] Major Outbreaks.
+1 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns for every [icon:TRADITION] Tradition slotted into the [icon:GOVERNMENT] Government.
+5 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold and +1 [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence for every active [icon:TRADE_ROUTE] Trade Route.
+5 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold and +1 [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence for every active [icon:TRADE_ROUTE] Trade Route.
+2 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science on [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science Buildings. +20% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards constructing [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science Buildings.
-4 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in all Settlements following your [icon:NAR_REW_RELIGION] Religion.
Likes Leaders at war with anyone but him.
+50% [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence towards initiating [icon:ENDEAVOR] Endeavors if you have the least amount of Settlements, +20% otherwise.
[icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns gain [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production equal to your [icon:ATTRIBUTE_MILITARISTIC] Militaristic Attribute. -5 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.
+10 [icon:Action_Heal] Healing for Units. +1 [icon:Action_Move] Movement for Armies and Fleets.
+10%[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities not founded by you.
Gain 20 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science Per Age for every Science Building constructed.
+1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold per Age for each Resource assigned to Cities.
+1[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production in the Capital for every Town.
+1 Settlement Limit per Age, but +50% Convert to City cost.
+1 Movement for Scouts, Merchants, Settlers, and Explorers.
+1 Movement for Scouts, Merchants, Settlers, and Explorers.
+1 Movement for Scouts, Merchants, Settlers, and Explorers.
+1 Movement for Scouts, Merchants, Settlers, and Explorers.
+1[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness per Age on Military Buildings.
Cities gain 2% [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science per Great Work on display. (Max 20%)
+2 Combat Strength for Naval Units while attacking.
Defeating any Naval Unit grants [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold equal to 25% of its Combat Strength.
Start with one extra Social Policy slot.
+1 [icon:YIELD_FOOD]Food per Age per Cavalry Unit Stationed on a Town Center.
+2[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness per Age for each Social Policy slotted in your Government.
+2[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness per Age for each Social Policy slotted in your Government.
+1 [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence per Age per Pasture Improvement.
Costs opponents 50% more [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY]Influence to reject your Diplomatic Actions.
Gain 25 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture per Age for every Diplomatic Action accepted by another Leader.
+2 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Per Age in Settlements with a Naval Unit stationed on a District.
+1 [icon:YIELD_FOOD]Food per Age in Settlements for each City-State you are Suzerain of.
+1 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION]Production per Age in Settlements for each City-State you are Suzerain of.

When you defeat a Support Unit, gain [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold equal to the Unit’s [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production cost. When you defeat a Naval Unit, gain [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold equal to 25% of the Unit’s [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production cost.
+1 [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource Capacity in all [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities in Homelands. +10 Range for all [icon:TRADE_ROUTE] Trade Routes.
Gain 1 [icon:UNIT_MIGRANT] Migrant when a [icon:YIELD_CITIES] City is [icon:YIELD_PLAGUE] Infected but -25% [icon:GROWTH_RATE] Growth Rate in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.
Gain 1 [icon:UNIT_MIGRANT] Migrant when a [icon:YIELD_CITIES] City is [icon:YIELD_PLAGUE] Infected but -25% [icon:GROWTH_RATE] Growth Rate in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.
+50% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards training all Military Units, but +1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Maintenance for all Units.
+1 Movement for Land Units within the Command Radius.
+1 Movement for Naval Units within the Command Radius.
[icon:UNIT_HOPLITE] Hoplites gain +1 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for each [icon:CITYSTATE] City-State you are Suzerain of.
The [icon:UNIT_PEDANDA] Pedanda grants an extra 25 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture when it converts a Settlement.
+2[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold and +2[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on the Palace and Wonders.
[icon:UNIT_MEDJAY] Medjay generate +1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold when stationed in a Settlement you own.
A boost for a non-Civilization-unique starting [icon:RADIAL_CIVICS] Civic in the next age.
A boost for a starting [icon:RADIAL_TECH] Tech in the next Age.
+3 [icon:Action_Ranged] Combat Strength for Ranged and Siege Units.
[icon:UNIT_FLEET_COMMANDER] Fleet Commanders gain the [icon:NAR_REW_PROMOTION] Flotilla Promotion for free.
+5 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for Heavy Naval Units.
+2 [icon:Action_Move] Movement for all Military Land Units, [icon:UNIT_SETTLER] Settlers, [icon:UNIT_MISSIONARY] Missionaries, and [icon:UNIT_CONQUISTADOR] Conquistadors when Embarked.
+1 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture in Settlements for each [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource assigned to them.
+15%[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold towards purchasing in all Settlements.
+1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resources in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns, or +2 in Towns in Distant Lands.
+1 [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource Capacity in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities, or +2 if you have 3 or fewer [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.
15% of [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food is refunded when a [icon:YIELD_CITIES] City grows by adding a [icon:SPECIALIST] Specialist.
Gain +1 [icon:YIELD_POPULATION] Population in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns. New [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns start with an additional [icon:YIELD_POPULATION] Population.
+10% [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food and [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness towards maintaining [icon:SPECIALIST] Specialists, or +20% if you have 3 or fewer [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.
+15% Yields in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns with a Specialization, or +30% in Distant Lands.
+1 [icon:SPECIALIST] Specialist Limit in all [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities, -1 [icon:SETTLEMENT_LIMIT] Settlement Limit.
+1 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities per [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Town you own. Repeatable.
Legend Unlock. +50% [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold towards converting a [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Town to a [icon:YIELD_CITIES] City.
Legend Unlock. +50% [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold towards converting a [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Town to a [icon:YIELD_CITIES] City.
+5 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength against [icon:INDEPENDENT_POWER] Independent Powers and [icon:CITYSTATE] City-States.
Gain 1 [icon:WAR_SUPPORT] War Support on all your [icon:WAR] Wars.
+50% [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence towards Levying Units from [icon:CITYSTATE] City-States.
Ignore the [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness penalty from [icon:YIELD_ANGRY] Unrest in captured Settlements.
[icon:UNIT_ARMY_COMMANDER] Commanders gain a free [icon:NAR_REW_PROMOTION] Level. New [icon:UNIT_ARMY_COMMANDER] Commanders start with a free [icon:NAR_REW_PROMOTION] Level.
Legend Unlock. +5 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for all Units against [icon:CITY_FORTIFIED] Fortified Districts.
Legend Unlock. +5 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for all Units against [icon:CITY_FORTIFIED] Fortified Districts.

Legend Unlock. +5 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for all Units against [icon:CITY_FORTIFIED] Fortified Districts.
Legend Unlock. +5 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for all Units against [icon:CITY_FORTIFIED] Fortified Districts.
Legend Unlock. +5 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for all Units against [icon:CITY_FORTIFIED] Fortified Districts.
Legend Unlock. +5 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for all Units against [icon:CITY_FORTIFIED] Fortified Districts.
+1[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in Settlements for each [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource assigned to them.
+50% [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence towards initiating and progressing the [icon:PROJECT] Befriend Independent Project.
+25% [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence towards supporting or rejecting [icon:DIPLOMATIC_ACTION] Diplomatic Actions.
Unlock the [icon:ESPIONAGE] Military Sabotage Espionage Action.
+1[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science per Age on the Palace and City Halls.
+20% [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold and [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness towards maintaining [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Buildings.
+1 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science in Settlements for each [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource assigned to them.
Legend Unlock. +1 to the adjacencies of standard [icon:YIELD_GOLD]Gold, [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION]Production, and [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE]Science Buildings.
+2[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food on Terrace Farms in Settlements with a Granary.
+3 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food on Farms and Terrace Farms if adjacent to at least 1 Mountain.
Units adjacent to the [icon:UNIT_PURABHETTARAH] Purabhettarah gain +5 [icon:Action_Heal] Healing.
+2 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness Buildings and [icon:WONDER] Wonders.
Cavalry Units gain +50% [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength from Flanking.
+5 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for all Military Units when defending against Ranged Units.
The [icon:NOTIFICATION_SELECT_CAPITAL] Capital receives 2 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for each [icon:RADIAL_TECH] Technology Mastery.
[icon:Action_Pillage] Pillaging grants experience to friendly [icon:UNIT_ARMY_COMMANDER] Commanders when within their [icon:COMMANDER_RADIUS] Command Radius.
+50% yields and healing from [icon:Action_Pillage] Pillaging [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Buildings.

Unlocks the [icon:DIPLOMATIC_ACTION] Gift Gurkha Action which grants a Gurkha Unit to another Civilization. Nepal receives a +10 [icon:RELATIONSHIP] Relationship with them and 5 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture (Scales by Gamespeed) for the current Relationship Level with them. Can only be done with [icon:PLAYER_RELATIONSHIP_FRIENDLY] Friendly or [icon:PLAYER_RELATIONSHIP_HELPFUL] Helpful Civilizations.
[icon:UNIT_ARMY_COMMANDER] Commanders immediately gain a [icon:NAR_REW_PROMOTION] Level. New [icon:UNIT_ARMY_COMMANDER] Commanders start with one [icon:NAR_REW_PROMOTION] Level.
+2 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for Military Units for each adjacent friendly Military Unit.

Units complete [icon:Action_Fortify] Fortifications in 1 turn if adjacent to a [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Mountain.

When you form an [icon:PLAYER_RELATIONSHIP_ALLIANCE] Alliance, both Leaders receive a free [icon:TRADE_ROUTE] Trade Route from the other Leader's [icon:NOTIFICATION_SELECT_CAPITAL] Capital (regardless of range); these [icon:TRADE_ROUTE] Trade Routes do not go away when the [icon:PLAYER_RELATIONSHIP_ALLIANCE] Alliance ends and do not count against your [icon:TRADE_ROUTE] Trade Route limit with this Civilization.

Gain a free [icon:UNIT_LEGION] Legion in new Settlements that you found.
+25% [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold towards purchasing [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Buildings in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.
+10 [icon:Action_Heal] Healing for Naval Units outside friendly territory.

+9[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production. Military Units trained in this Settlement will spawn at this [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Building's location. Grants a free [icon:NAR_REW_PROMOTION] Level to new [icon:UNIT_ARMY_COMMANDER] Commanders trained in this Settlement.

-8 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in Settlements that do not follow your [icon:NAR_REW_RELIGION] Religion. +2 Charges on new [icon:UNIT_MISSIONARY] Missionaries.
-6 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in Settlements more than 9 tiles away from your Palace.

+10% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards constructing [icon:WONDER] Wonders, doubled when constructed in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities in [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Desert Terrain. +2 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on [icon:WONDER] Wonders on Desert.
Likes the Leader doing the most Diplomatic Endeavors. Dislikes the one doing the most Sanctions.
+1 [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence in Cities for every [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource assigned to them.
+3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for Units in enemy territory.
[icon:UNIT_ARMY_COMMANDER] Army Commanders gain the [icon:NAR_REW_PROMOTION] Barrage Promotion for free.
+5 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for Infantry Units against [icon:CITY_FORTIFIED] Fortified Districts.
+2 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities for each [icon:CITYSTATE] City-State you are Suzerain of.
Likes the Civilization with the smallest number of Naval Units. Dislikes the one with the greatest number of Naval Units.
+3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for all Units when attacking. +25% yields and HP from [icon:Action_Pillage] Pillaging.

+3 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on [icon:CITY_UNIQUE_QUARTER] Quarters with at least 1 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness Building. +3 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on [icon:CITY_UNIQUE_QUARTER] Quarters with at least 1 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture Building.

[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food, [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold, and [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Buildings receive a +1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Adjacency for [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resources. Can apply multiple times per [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Building.
[icon:MILITARY] Military Buildings gain Adjacency from Coast.
When a unit destroys a [icon:CITY_FORTIFIED] Fortified District's defenses, all other Land Siege and Infantry Units have their [icon:Action_Move] Movement restored.
+20% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards constructing [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Buildings and [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvements in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities with a Rail Station.
Constructing a [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Building grants [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture equal to 25% of its [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production cost.
+1 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and +1 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Marine Terrain in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.
+3 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture from [icon:SPECIALIST] Specialists. -3 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.
-3 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in Settlements you did not found.

+50% [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture towards researching [icon:RADIAL_CIVICS] Civics that unlock an [icon:NOTIFICATION_IDEOLOGY_CHOSEN] Ideology but -50% [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness towards [icon:CELEBRATION] Celebrations.
+2 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Tundra, Desert, and Plains Terrain in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.
+1 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on Fishing Boats in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities. +2 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science on Fishing Boats on Reefs in all Settlements.
[icon:UNIT_EXPLORER] Explorers ignore Vegetated Terrain and Rivers for [icon:Action_Move] Movement.
+50% [icon:TRADE_INCOME] Trade Income, but -3 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.
Likes Leaders that leave Independent Powers alone. Dislikes those that disperse Independent Powers.
+1 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for all Units for every Civilization and City-State you have a [icon:TRADE_ROUTE] Trade Route with.
+25% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards training Air Units. +5 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for Air Units in your own territory.
+2 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on Mines on [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resources if there is at least 1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Building in that Settlement.
+1[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production and[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science on the Palace.

+3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for [icon:Action_Fortify] Fortified Units and [icon:CITY_FORTIFIED] Districts.
-10 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold for each [icon:CITYSTATE] City-State you are Suzerain of.
Likes the Civilization with the fewest Commander Levels. Dislikes the one with the most Commander Levels.
+3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for all Units adjacent to [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Mountains. This is doubled if the Unit is also in your territory.
All Units gain the Poison ability, +3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength against [icon:DAMAGED] Wounded Units.
+3 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold for every [icon:CITYSTATE] City-State you are Suzerain of.

+100% [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold towards purchasing Factories and Rail Stations while at [icon:WAR] War with a Leader with an opposing [icon:NOTIFICATION_IDEOLOGY_CHOSEN] Ideology.
Training a Military Unit grants [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science equal to 25% of the Unit’s cost while at [icon:WAR] War with a Leader with an opposing [icon:NOTIFICATION_IDEOLOGY_CHOSEN] Ideology.

+5 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture per [icon:NAR_REW_PROMOTION] Commander Level in the [icon:NOTIFICATION_SELECT_CAPITAL] Capital while at [icon:WAR] War with a Leader with an opposing [icon:NOTIFICATION_IDEOLOGY_CHOSEN] Ideology.
[icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns gain [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness equal to your [icon:ATTRIBUTE_POLITICAL] Diplomatic Attribute. -5 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.
+50% [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence towards initiating and progressing the [icon:PROJECT] Befriend Independent Project.
Likes Civilizations with fewer Trade Routes than him. Dislikes those that have as many or more Trade Routes than him.
Likes Leaders that are at war with others, besides him. Dislikes those that are not at war with others, besides him.
+2 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold for each active [icon:TRADE_ROUTE] Trade Route while you have at least 3 [icon:ENDEAVOR] Endeavors active.
